channel.title: MySQL on Rehoni | 罗皓
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on Rehoni | 罗皓

item.title: MySQL通过Explain计划优化sql
item.description: Explain计划 MySQL执行中，遇到一个执行起来很慢的SQL语句 SELECT t.ORG_NAME AS OBJECT_NAME, t.ORG_ID, f.DEFECT_LEVEL FROM GEA_ORGANIZATION_INFO t INNER JOIN MAPPER_EMS_STATION s ON s.VINDICATE_OID = t.ORG_ID INNER JOIN MAPPER_EMS_DEVICE d ON d.SITE_ID = s.FUNCTION_ID INNER JOIN SORT_DICT tt ON d.sort_id = tt.sort_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM GEA_SP_PD_DEFECT WHERE STATE IN ( 3, 4 ) AND REPORT_TIME BETWEEN str_to_date( '2020-07-01 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND str_to_date( '2020-07-11 15:15:11', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )) f ON f.SITE_ID = s.FUNCTION_ID AND f.
